text: 4|47|He kitabapraptagana, tomadera kache ya ache tara samarthakarupe amara ya nayila karechi tate tomara imana ana [1], amara mukhamandalaguloke bikrta kare tarapara seguloke pichanera dike phiriye deyara age [2] athaba as‌habus‌ sab‌take yerupa la’nata karechilama [3] serupa taderake la’nata karara age. Ara allah‌ra adesa karyakari haye'i thake.
